languages.text: "Мы славно провели время, и я благодарен за это. Но роман между нами мог бы повлиять на наши... рабочие отношения".
"We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."
languages.original_text: "Мы славно провели время, и я благодарен за это. Но роман между нами мог бы повлиять на наши... рабочие отношения".

traits.locale_text: "We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."
"We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."
"We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."
"We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."
"We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."

languages.text: "Wir hatten eine schöne Zeit miteinander, und dafür bin ich dankbar. Aber eine Affäre hätte womöglich Auswirkungen auf unser ... Arbeitsverhältnis."
languages.original_text: "We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."

traits.locale_text: "Wir hatten eine schöne Zeit miteinander, und dafür bin ich dankbar. Aber eine Affäre hätte womöglich Auswirkungen auf unser ... Arbeitsverhältnis."

languages.text: « Nous avons passé un bon moment ensemble et j'en suis reconnaissant, mais une liaison entre nous risquerait de nuire à notre... relation professionnelle. »
languages.original_text: "We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons passé un bon moment ensemble et j'en suis reconnaissant, mais une liaison entre nous risquerait de nuire à notre... relation professionnelle. »

languages.text: 「一緒に過ごした時間は楽しかったですし、感謝しています。ですが、私たちの関係がそういうものになると…仕事上の関係に影響が出るかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."

traits.locale_text: 「一緒に過ごした時間は楽しかったですし、感謝しています。ですが、私たちの関係がそういうものになると…仕事上の関係に影響が出るかもしれません」

languages.text: «Hemos pasado un buen rato y lo agradezco. Pero un lance entre nosotros podría afectar a nuestra... relación profesional».
languages.original_text: "We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos pasado un buen rato y lo agradezco. Pero un lance entre nosotros podría afectar a nuestra... relación profesional».

languages.text: “我们在一起度过了一段美好的时光，我也很感激，但我们之间的感情恐怕会影响我们的……工作关系。”
languages.original_text: "We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."

traits.locale_text: “我们在一起度过了一段美好的时光，我也很感激，但我们之间的感情恐怕会影响我们的……工作关系。”

languages.text: "Güzel zaman geçirdik, bunun için minnettarım. Ancak bu tarz bir ilişki, asıl görevimizi etkileyebilir."
languages.original_text: "We had a good time together, and I'm grateful for that. But an affair between us could affect our... working relationship."

traits.locale_text: "Güzel zaman geçirdik, bunun için minnettarım. Ancak bu tarz bir ilişki, asıl görevimizi etkileyebilir."
